alert.note: Alert for Hickory; Polk (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 17 at 8:11PM CDT until July 17 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN HICKORY...NORTHWESTERN DALLAS AND NORTHEASTERN POLK COUNTIES... At 811 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Urbana, or 7 miles east of Hermitage, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pomme de Terre Lake, Pomme De Terre State Park, Urbana, Preston, Louisburg, Pumpkin Center and Nemo. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
